descriptionHtml:
Soul Gems Rebalanced Ver 1.0 by SteepledHat

(There is an optional file that only adds the craftable-only-at-night black soul gem to the forge. So don\'t let all the other changes deter you. )

This mod makes soul gems more expensive and alters the levels associated with each soul level. It also adds black soul gems to the smelter, but only during the hours of 12 AM to 5 AM. It also removes filled black and grand soul gems from vendor lists and makes filled gems much less common in vendors. 

There is also an add on that makes the levels of enemies match up with the soul levels described below. It is called \"Enemy Levels Revamped.\" It increases the level of many enemies without changing the level gate (Level Gate = Player level at which an enemy starts to appear.)  It should be used to get the full experience of this mod. But keep in mind, this will make the game harder so be warned. :)
---------------------------------------------
Changes:

         Price Empty | Price Filled | Soul Rank to Level Relation
Black:     3000             3500          NPC and Grand
Grand:     2000             3500          LV 50+
Greater:   1000             1750          LV 38-49
Common:     500              875          LV 25-37
Lesser:     250              440          LV 11-24
Petty:      100              175          LV 1-10

Making Black Soul Gems at the Smelter:
To get the recipe to appear you must:
1. Have the Soul Trap Spell.
2. Have a conjuration skill of 75 or above.
3. Activate the smelter during the hours of 12 AM to 5 AM.

To make a black soul gem you need an empty grand soul gem and a daedra heart.

---------------------------------------------
Optionals:
Craftable Black Soul Gem Standalone Daedra Heart Version:
This version only adds a recipe to the smelter (no other changes) to create a black soul gem in the hours of 12AM to 5AM. Black Soul Gems require a daedra heart and emptly Grand Soul Gem to make.

Craftable Black Soul Gem Standalone Single Grand Soul Gem Version:
This version only adds a recipe to the smelter (no other changes) to create a black soul gem in the hours of 12AM to 5AM. Black Soul Gems require a single emptly Grand Soul Gem to make. 

DON\'T USE THESE OPTIONALS WITH THE MAIN VERSION OR TOGETHER!!!!

---------------------------------------------
Compatibility:
This mod is not compatible with any mod that alters the data related to soul gems. (It will work with texture and mesh replacers, however.) I made adjustments to the empty soul gems so that you shouldn\'t lose souls much like the mod \"Acquisitive Soul Gems.\" So my mod should have the same functionality as it. (You should not use the two together, mine should provide the same benefit with the additional changes to price and soul level.)

The optional files should work with anything as all they do is add a single recipe. :)
---------------------------------------------

Future Plans:
When the CK is released, I\'ll make a few necromancer alters and make it so you craft the black soul gems there rather than the forge.
I also plan to remove black soul gems from Blackreach geode veins.
---------------------------------------------

Errors and Bugs:
Please report any inconsistencies or error on the comments section for this topic or private message me. I\'ll be glad to fix them as soon as possible. Thanks!

---------------------------------------------

DO NOT REUPLOAD MY MOD ANYWHERE!!!! THAT MAKES ME A SAD PANDA!!!
FEEL FREE TO ALTER IT FOR YOUR PERSONAL USE, BUT CONTACT ME IF YOU WISH TO INCORPORATE IT INTO YOUR MOD. Thanks. :)
